statements: DELETE FROM wine_preferences WHERE name = 'Alice Smith' AND wine_ratings @> '{"Red": 5}';
DELETE FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 100 AND preference_1 = 'Red Wine';
DELETE FROM wine_ratings WHERE customer_id = 200 AND rating_value >= 4.0;
DELETE FROM wine_ratings WHERE customer_id = 202 AND wine_bottle_id = 303;
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 1 AND purchase_date <= '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM ratings WHERE rating > 4 AND wine_bottle_id IN (SELECT wine_id FROM wines WHERE region = 'France');
